column4: Musk hints at Tesla interest in Daimler van
column5: Tesla Inc  could be interested in partnering with Daimler AG's  Mercedes-Benz on an electric version of its Sprinter van  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said in a tweet https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1064541185820114944 on Monday.

column4: Musk hints at Tesla interest in Daimler van
column5: Nov 19 Tesla Inc could be interested in partnering with Daimler AG's Mercedes-Benz on an electric version of its Sprinter van  Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk said in a tweet https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1064541185820114944 on Monday.
